ValidationRule.description: Validation Rule to avoid set to 'Tracked' some fields.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( FLODocs__Data_Type__c = "BitVector", OR( AND(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(FLODocs__Data_Change_Tracking__c),""), ISPICKVAL(FLODocs__Data_Change_Tracking__c,"Tracked, Non-Blocking")), AND(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(FLODocs__Data_Change_Tracking__c),""), ISPICKVAL(FLODocs__Data_Change_Tracking__c,"Tracked, Blocking")), AND(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(FLODocs__Data_Change_Tracking__c),"Not Tracked"), ISPICKVAL(FLODocs__Data_Change_Tracking__c,"Tracked, Non-Blocking")), AND(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(FLODocs__Data_Change_Tracking__c),"Not Tracked"), ISPICKVAL(FLODocs__Data_Change_Tracking__c,"Tracked, Blocking")) )),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Fields whose Data Type is BitVector cannot be tracked.
